mapper.sql: close_dtime, tag_no, tag_data, qlty_cd, coll_dtime, last_upd_user, last_upd_dtime, delete_flag

cmt_close_day.close_dtime, cmt_close_day.tag_no, cmt_close_day.tag_data, cmt_close_day.qlty_cd, cmt_close_day.coll_dtime, cmt_close_day.last_upd_user, cmt_close_day.last_upd_dtime,cmt_close_day.delete_flag, cmm_tag_master_v.lcode, cmm_tag_master_v.comment1, cmm_tag_master_v.unit_computer, cmm_tag_master_v.dp, cmm_tag_master_v.upper_value, cmm_tag_master_v.lower_value, cmm_tag_master_v.tag_kind, cmm_tag_master_v.io_kind, cmm_tag_master_v.repo_div, cmm_tag_master_v.repo_calc_div, cmm_tag_master_v.odb_min_snd_flag, cmm_tag_master_v.odb_hour_snd_flag, cmm_tag_master_v.odb_day_snd_flag, round_flag, cmm_tag_master_v.rem_tag_no, cmm_tag_master_v.scr_update_flag, cmm_tag_master_v.tag_logic_name1, cmm_tag_master_v.tag_logic_name2, cmm_tag_master_v.tag_logic_name3, cmm_tag_master_v.tag_logic_name4, cmm_tag_master_v.current_data_flag,cmm_tag_master_v.hourly_data_flag,cmm_tag_master_v.daily_data_flag,cmm_tag_master_v.monthly_data_flag,cmm_tag_master_v.close_kind
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from public.cmt_close_day
and
where
delete_flag = 0
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from public.cmt_close_day inner join public.cmm_tag_master_v on public.cmt_close_day.tag_no = public.cmm_tag_master_v.tag_no
and
where
cmt_close_day.delete_flag = 0
order by cmt_close_day.${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into public.cmt_close_day (close_dtime, tag_no, tag_data, qlty_cd, coll_dtime, last_upd_user, last_upd_dtime, delete_flag) values (#{closeDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tagNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tagData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qltyCd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{collDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC})

insert into public.cmt_close_day
close_dtime,
tag_no,
tag_data,
qlty_cd,
coll_dtime,
last_upd_user,
last_upd_dtime, delete_flag,
#{closeDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{tagNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tagData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{qltyCd,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{collDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lastUpdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastUpdDtime = now(), deleteFlag = 0,
mapper.select:
select count(*) from public.cmt_close_day
and
where
delete_flag = 0
mapper.update:
update public.cmt_close_day
close_dtime = #{record.closeDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tag_no = #{record.tagNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tag_data = #{record.tagData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qlty_cd = #{record.qltyCd,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
coll_dtime = #{record.collDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_upd_user = #{record.lastUpdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_upd_dtime = #{record.lastUpdDtime,jdbcType=DATE},
delete_flag = #{record.deleteFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
and
where
delete_flag = 0

update public.cmt_close_day set close_dtime = #{record.closeDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tag_no = #{record.tagNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag_data = #{record.tagData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qlty_cd = #{record.qltyCd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, coll_dtime = #{record.collDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_upd_user = #{record.lastUpdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_upd_dtime = now(), delete_flag = #{record.deleteFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
and
where
delete_flag = 0

update public.cmt_close_day
tag_data = #{tagData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qlty_cd = #{qltyCd,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
coll_dtime = #{collDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_upd_user = #{lastUpdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_upd_dtime = now(),
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
where close_dtime = #{closeDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and tag_no = #{tagNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_flag = 0
mapper.insert: insert into public.cmt_close_day (close_dtime, tag_no, tag_data, qlty_cd, coll_dtime, last_upd_user, last_upd_dtime,delete_flag) select cmt_close_day.close_dtime + '1 days', cmt_close_day.tag_no, CASE WHEN TAG_LOGIC_NAME1 = 'ZERO_VAL' THEN '0' ELSE tag_data END, cmt_close_day.qlty_cd, cmt_close_day.coll_dtime + '1 days', #{className,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, now(),cmt_close_day.delete_flag from cmt_close_day inner join cmm_tag_master_v on cmt_close_day.tag_no = cmm_tag_master_v.tag_no where close_dtime = #{targetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and REPO_CALC_DIV = 'M';
